::Hot Rod/Epyon::

"Ok, there is nothing more to do here. Let's go," said Epyon.
Hot Rod transformed to car mode, and Epyon placed Nightstrike within Hot
Rod. Epyon then transformed to dragon mode. They started to make their
way out of the arena.
